t: Amazon.in: Happy things
s: Happy Things started with the idea to add a smile to your face. COVID-19 turned things upside down and 2020 brought a lot of challenges for everyone. The pandemic redefined the meaning of happiness for a lot of us and made us re-examine the things that really bring us joy.

t: Amazon Puts Its Own “Brands” First Above Better-Rated Products – The Markup
s: Gomez, founder of Atlanta-based consumer goods startup 4Q Brands, said he obsessively refined his photos and description, amassed reviews from happy customers, and paid Amazon $40,000 a month on advertising to boost sales, one of the elements Amazon tells sellers will increase search ranking.
